ReviewList.Text: An earlier edition was my textbook in a community college class named after the book.  A remarkable assembly of basic concepts in physics, unencumbered by endless calculations, but soundly and thoughtfully presented in concepts with supporting equations applied.  There is a reason this book is in at least its 12 edition.  In addition, the book is printed in over 20 languages around the world.  Any student fortunate enough to have a course built around Mr. Hewitt's genius for clarity will come away with a better understanding of how the world works.  His love for the discipline shines through with humor, illustrations and equations which inspire students around the globe.  If you love physics, Conceptual Physics needs to be on your Must Read list.

This book was required for our daughter's masters program and it was very nice to be able to get it here for about eighty percent less than her local book store wanted... yes, about one fifth the cost. Excellent. If required for you, compare and save here too plus get it quickly like we did!
I had to use this for a physics class. I liked it because it was basic and the layout was organized and easy to navigate.
My teen is loving this text book.  Commented that the author is engaging and organized.  So far, so good!
This was my Textbook for 1st year at Uni, well laid out and really enjoying the subject.

the book came in the mail quickly but it was listed in very good condition with what looks like coffee spilled on the front cover and the first few pages...also highlighting on the first few chapters.
